author: OrchidAlloy
description: Steals emojis sent by other people and optionally uploads them to your own server. Can also get an image link to an emoji of your own choosing, useful for mobile. Supports context menu commands.
install_msg:
😶 __**EmojiSteal**__ ```EmojiSteal installed. Instructions:
1. Load the cog with [p]load emojisteal
2. Try replying to a message containing emojis from another server with [p]steal or [p]steal upload [emojiname]
3. Optionally, enable the context menus with [p]slash enablecog emojisteal, then [p]slash sync```
short: Steals emojis sent by other people.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
